action_output_list: The user wants to send a new SMS message. The Messages app is on the home screen.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Messages"}
To send a new SMS message, I need to click the compose message button.{"action_type": "click", "index": 3}
The next step is to enter the contact to send the message to. The UI element with index 3 is the text field to enter the contact.{"action_type": "click", "index": 3}

The user wants to send a message to a contact. The current screen shows the "To" field, which is where the contact's name or number should be entered. I will type in a contact name.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "John", "index": 3}
The user has typed "John" and now needs to select the contact from the list. I will scroll down to see if the contact is visible.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 14}

I need to select a contact to send the message to. Since I scrolled down in the previous step, I should scroll up to see if the contact "John" is visible.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "up", "index": 14}

The user is trying to send a message to a contact named John. The current screen shows a list of contacts after searching for "John". I need to click on the correct contact to proceed. I will click on the first contact in the list.{"action_type": "click", "index": 5}
I need to type the message to send to John. The text field to type the message is at index 17.{"action_type": "click", "index": 17}
I need to type the message to send to John.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Hello John", "index": 17}
I have finished typing the message "Hello John". Now I need to send the message. The send button is usually located near the text input field.{"action_type": "click", "index": 19}

The user has already sent the message "Hello John" in the previous step, and the current screen shows the main screen of the messaging app. Therefore, the goal of sending a new SMS message to a contact has been achieved.{"action_type": "answer", "text": "The message has been sent."}

The user has already sent the message "Hello John" to John. The current screen shows the main screen of the messaging app. The task is complete.{"action_type": "answer", "text": "Message sent to John."}

The user has already sent the message "Hello John" to John. The current screen shows the main screen of the messaging app. The task is complete.{"action_type": "answer", "text": "Message sent to John."}
